column4: Can someone please tell me how to know which server you are using?
It's saying no lsb modules are available.
ok, that was your questions, wasnt it?
Actually I am trying to use evolution with my yahoo account. And I don't know which server name to use?
the server version of your os (though you are using server-edition)
for the yahoo-adress its a good idea to look at the faq from yahoo
Is their need to contact ISP?
no it should be find in the yahoo-help
Can you please give me the link to search help?
the incoming mail server on yahoo is to be server text box of receive Email tab of evolution?
